aduq_1.Description: 1. Have you used Alcohol (any use at all) in your lifetime?

aduq_10.Description: 10. Have you used Cannabis (marijuana, pot, hash) in your lifetime?

aduq_10a.Description: 10a. How many years have you used Cannabis?

aduq_10b.Description: 10b. How many DAYS have you used Cannabis (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_10c.Description: 10c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_11.Description: 11. Have you used Hallucinogens (LSD/acid, salvia, shrooms, peyote, 2CB) in your lifetime?"

aduq_11a.Description: 11a. How many years have you used Hallucinogens?

aduq_11b.Description:
11b. How many DAYS have you used Hallucinogens (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment
entry?

aduq_11c.Description: 11c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_12.Description: 12. Have you used Inhalants (nitrous, poppers, amyl, whippets, paint, glue, gas, etc.) in your lifetime?

aduq_12a.Description: 12a. How many years have you used Inhalants?

aduq_12b.Description: 12b. How many DAYS have you used Inhalants (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_12c.Description: 12c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_13.Description: 13. Have you used More than 1 substance per day (including alcohol) in your lifetime?

aduq_13a.Description: 13a. How many years have you used More than 1 substance per day (including alcohol)?

aduq_13b.Description: 13b. How many DAYS have you used More than 1 substance per day (including alcohol) (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_14.Description: 14. Have you ever injected Methamphetamine or Opioids?

aduq_15.Description: 15. How many times in your life have you injected Methamphetamine?

aduq_16___1.Description: 16. What routes of administration have you tried with Methamphetamine?: Oral

aduq_16___2.Description: 16. What routes of administration have you tried with Methamphetamine?: Nasal

aduq_16___3.Description: 16. What routes of administration have you tried with Methamphetamine?: Smoking

aduq_16___4.Description: 16. What routes of administration have you tried with Methamphetamine?: Injecting

aduq_16___99.Description: 16. What routes of administration have you tried with Methamphetamine?: Other

aduq_17.Description: 17. How many times in your life have you injected Opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.)?

aduq_18___1.Description: 18. What routes of administration have you tried with Opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.)?: Oral

aduq_18___2.Description: 18. What routes of administration have you tried with Opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.)?: Nasal

aduq_18___3.Description: 18. What routes of administration have you tried with Opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.)?: Smoking

aduq_18___4.Description: 18. What routes of administration have you tried with Opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.)?: Injecting

aduq_18___99.Description: 18. What routes of administration have you tried with Opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.)?: Other

aduq_19.Description: 19. What is the overall value (in dollars) of the amount of opioids (heroin, pain meds and etc.) you have used in <u>last month</u> before recovery (monthly cost of your opioids)?

aduq_1a.Description: 1a. How many years have you used Alcohol (any use at all)?

aduq_1b.Description: 1b. How many DAYS have you used Alcohol (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_2.Description: 2. Have you used Alcohol (to intoxication) in your lifetime?

aduq_20.Description: 20. What is the overall value (in dollars) of the amount of methamphetamine you have used in <u>last month</u> before recovery (monthly cost of your methamphetamine)?

aduq_21.Description: 21. What is the overall value (in dollars) of the amount of drugs (excluding alcohol) you have used in <u>last month</u> before recovery?

aduq_22.Description: 22. What is the overall value (in dollars) of the amount of alcohol you have used in <u>last month</u> before recovery

aduq_23.Description: 23. When have you started to use heroin?

aduq_24.Description: 24. How many months have you been using heroin at least once a week in your life?

aduq_25.Description: 25. When was the last time that you have used heroin?

aduq_26.Description: 26. When have you started to use opioids other than heroin (i.e., pain meds and etc.)?

aduq_27.Description: 27. How many months have you been using opioids other than heroin (i.e., pain meds and etc.) at least once a week in your life?

aduq_28.Description: 28. When was the last time that you have used opioids other than heroin (i.e., pain meds and etc.) at least once a week in your life?

aduq_29.Description: 29. When have you started to use Methamphetamine?

aduq_2a.Description: 2a .How many years have you used Alcohol (to intoxication)?

aduq_2b.Description: 2b. How many DAYS have you used Alcohol (to intoxication) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_3.Description: 3. Have you used Heroin in your lifetime?

aduq_30.Description: 30. How many months have you been using Methamphetamine at least once a week in your life?

aduq_31.Description: 31. When was the last time that you have used Methamphetamine?

aduq_32.Description: 32. During last 30 days before entering to the treatment and start your current period of recovery, How many grams of Heroin have you been using per day?

aduq_33.Description: 33. During last 30 days before entering to the treatment and start your current period of recovery, How many opioid pills (pain meds and etc.) have you been using per day?

aduq_34.Description: 34. During last 30 days before entering to the treatment and start your current period of recovery, How many grams of meth have you been using per day?

aduq_3a.Description: 3a. How many years have you used Heroin?

aduq_3b.Description: 3b. How many DAYS have you used Heroin (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_3c.Description: 3c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_4.Description: 4. Have you used Methadone in your lifetime?

aduq_4a.Description: 4a. How many years have you used Methadone?

aduq_4b.Description: 4b. How many DAYS have you used Methadone (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_4c.Description: 4c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_5.Description:
5. Have you used Other Opiates/Analgesics
(opium, codeine, Vicodin, Oxycontin, pain meds other than as prescribed) in your lifetime?

aduq_5a.Description: 5a. How many years have you used Other Opiates/Analgesics?

aduq_5b.Description: 5b. How many DAYS have you used Opiates/Analgesics (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_5c.Description: 5c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_6.Description: 6. Have you used Barbiturates (Quaaludes, phenobarb, librium) in your lifetime?

aduq_6a.Description: 6a. How many years have you used Barbiturates?

aduq_6b.Description: 6b. How many DAYS have you used Barbiturates (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_6c.Description: 6c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_7.Description: 7. Have you used Sedatives/Hypnotics/Tranquilzers (Valium, Xanax, Soma) in your lifetime?

aduq_7a.Description: 7a. How many years have you used Sedatives/Hypnotics/Tranquilzers?

aduq_7b.Description: 7b. How many DAYS have you used Sedatives/Hypnotics/Tranquilizers (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_7c.Description: 7c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_8.Description: 8. Have you used Cocaine (coke, blow, crack) in your lifetime?

aduq_8a.Description: 8a. How many years have you used Cocaine?

aduq_8b.Description: 8b. How many DAYS have you used Cocaine (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_8c.Description: 8c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.

aduq_9.Description: 9. Have you used Amphetamines (including methamphetamine, speed, crystal, meth, Ritalin, Adderall, stimulant pills, performance enhancing, "ripped fuel", ephedrine, diet pills) in your lifetime?

aduq_9a.Description: 9a. How many years have you used Amphetamines?

aduq_9b.Description: 9b. How many DAYS have you used Amphetamines (any use at all) in the last 30 days BEFORE treatment entry?

aduq_9c.Description: 9c. Please select the usual or most recent route.  For more than one route, chose the most severe. The routes are listed from least severe to most severe.
